bitsToBytes¶

zserio.bitposition.bitsToBytes(numBits: int) → int[source]¶

Converts number of bits to bytes.

Parameters

numBits – The number of bits to convert.

Returns

Number of bytes

Raises

PythonRuntimeException – If number of bits to convert is not divisible by 8.

alignTo

Next topic
